internalPackage.title: Internal Training
internalPackage.content: Our Internal Training package offers comprehensive legal support for your business. With personalized guidance and expert advice, we ensure your company remains compliant and protected.
internalPackage.additionalContent: In this package, you can choose between Online and Offline*

generalPackage.title: General Training
generalPackage.content: Our General Training package is designed to provide a strong foundation for your business. From company formation to providing a professional address, we are here to assist you every step of the way.
generalPackage.additionalContent: In this package, you can choose between Online and Offline*
